metadata.name: Generate JSDoc Documentation
metadata.shortDescription: Generate comprehensive inline JSDoc comments for JavaScript/TypeScript source files
metadata.description: Generates inline JSDoc documentation for JavaScript and TypeScript files using AWS Strands multi-agent system. MODIFIES source code by adding comprehensive @param, @returns, @throws, @example, and @remarks comments. Runs in spawn mode to allow parallel work. Creates git branch by default for safety. Supports in-place modification or copy-to-folder mode.
objectives: Accept repository folder path for analysis (defaults to workspace root)
Determine output mode: in-place (modifies source) or copy-to-folder
Create git branch automatically for safety (unless explicitly disabled)
Execute jsdoc-gen command via straf-cli in spawn mode
Allow user to continue working while JSDoc generation runs
Report completion status and file locations with warnings about code modification
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

prompts.name: generate-jsdoc
prompts.description: Main prompt for JSDoc inline documentation generation

tools.name: spawn-jsdoc-generator
tools.description: Spawn wrapper for background JSDoc generation

tools.name: check-jsdoc-processes
tools.description: Check status of spawned JSDoc generation processes

tools.name: straf-cli
tools.description: AWS Strands CLI for multi-agent JSDoc generation
